pick-and-pack.title: Pick and Pack
pick-and-pack.description: Our Pick and Pack service is built around precision and speed. We receive, store, and handle your inventory with care—picking items per order and packaging them securely with accurate labelling. This service is ideal for businesses needing tailored fulfilment without compromising accuracy or delivery times.

pharmaceutical.title: Pharmaceutical
pharmaceutical.description: We specialise in handling temperature-sensitive and regulated medical goods. From secure packaging to controlled storage and final delivery, our facilities and trained team ensure safe, compliant handling of all pharmaceutical shipments.

aog.title: AOG (Aircraft on Ground)
aog.description: Our AOG service is built for urgency. We provide immediate dispatch of aircraft components using direct transport and priority handling—minimising downtime and keeping your aircraft operations moving.

time-critical-deliveries.title: Time Critical Deliveries
time-critical-deliveries.description: When timing is non-negotiable, we deliver. Our team ensures fast road transport across the UK and EU, using dedicated vehicles and live tracking to meet your deadline-driven delivery needs.

on-board-courier.title: On Board Courier
on-board-courier.description: We assign a personal courier to carry your urgent or sensitive shipment on a commercial flight, keeping it under constant supervision. From collection to delivery, the item never leaves their hands—offering maximum security and traceability.

etsf.title: ETSF (External Temporary Storage Facility)
etsf.description: Our ETSF facility offers secure storage for import cargo under customs control. We manage your documentation, provide status updates, and ensure fast release once clearance is granted—keeping delays to a minimum.

x-ray-screening.title: X-Ray Screening
x-ray-screening.description: We provide aviation-grade X-ray screening for cargo, ensuring it complies with airport and airline safety regulations. Our certified team uses advanced scanning technology for fast, secure inspections.

warehousing.title: Warehousing
warehousing.description: Our storage facilities are built for safe handling and flexible access. We manage palletised goods, process orders, and provide services like PMC build-ups and secure inventory control—whether for short-term holding or longer storage.
